title: Edit Subjects,
subtitle: Intelligently
description: Our AI technology intelligently identifies and preserves background scenes during editing. Change subjects without affecting backgrounds, or update backgrounds while keeping subjects intact. Perfect precision control ensures every edit is exactly what you want.
demoSubtitle: Upload an image to experience intelligent scene preservation
howSubtitle: Three simple steps to preserve your scenes perfectly
step1Desc: Upload the image you want to edit. Our AI will automatically identify subjects and scenes.
step2Desc: Select whether to edit the subject or the background. The system will automatically preserve the unselected area.
step3Desc: Download your edited image. The preserved areas remain pixel-perfect, as if untouched.
scenariosSubtitle: Scene preservation technology for various editing scenarios
scenario1Ex: Example: Update a person's outfit while keeping the background scene completely unchanged
scenario2Ex: Example: Change the background location while keeping the subject's posture and expression identical
scenario3Ex: Example: Modify a person's pose or expression while maintaining all background elements
scenario4Ex: Example: Change scene colors or atmosphere while keeping the subject's original appearance
useCase1Desc: Edit portraits without affecting backgrounds. Change clothing, expressions, or poses while preserving scene details.
useCase2Desc: Adjust actors or scenes in video frames. Scene preservation ensures consistency across edits.
useCase3Desc: Showcase properties in different settings. Change backgrounds while keeping interior details perfectly preserved.
useCase4Desc: Display products in various scenes. Update backgrounds to match different marketing campaigns.
useCase5Desc: Combine elements from different images. Scene preservation ensures natural-looking composites.
useCase6Desc: Create engaging content with perfect edits. Change backgrounds or subjects while maintaining visual quality.
feat1Desc: Advanced AI accurately identifies subjects and scenes, ensuring perfect preservation boundaries.
feat2Desc: Seamless blending between edited and preserved areas creates natural-looking results.
feat3Desc: Intelligent algorithms handle complex scenes, maintaining detail and quality throughout.
feat4Desc: Preserves textures, shadows, and lighting in protected areas for authentic results.
feat5Desc: Edit subjects or backgrounds independently, or combine multiple preservation modes.
feat6Desc: High-resolution output maintains quality in both edited and preserved areas.
finalSubtitle: Experience the power of intelligent scene preservation technology
